summary: In a post-apocalyptic New York City, three tribes of mutants (the Norms, the Mutates and the Upriver people) battle each other to survive.
cast: Robert Clarke|Margaret Field|Gloria Saunders|Ron Randell|Stuart Randall|Paula Dorety|Robert Bice|Chili Williams|William Schallert|Eric Colmar|Douglas Evans|Marshall Bradford|Tom Daly
title: Captive Women
